attributes.action: Bring in the fraud squad to investigate MP's expences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a police investigation to investigate MP who knowingly steel money off the tax payer, not just pay it back & say "sorry" treat them the same way has the ordinary public

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
